techmeme.title: Former CEO of digital pharma ad company Outcome Health is sentenced to seven and a half years in prison, after being found guilty of a ~$1B fraud in April 2023 (Wall Street Journal)
ORA, a blockchain project to incorporate AI into decentralized apps, raised a $20M Series A from Polychain, HF0, HashKey Capital, and others (Bradley Keoun/CoinDesk)
Figma debuts a major UI redesign, new generative AI tools, and a built-in slideshow feature, which is free in beta but will be a paid product at official launch (Jay Peters/The Verge)
Crypto investment app Abra and CEO William Barhydt settle with 25 US states for operating without proper licenses and will return up to $82.1M to US customers (Cheyenne Ligon/CoinDesk)
Hands-on with Ray-Ban Meta's new AI translation feature, which is too rudimentary and buggy to be anything more than a novelty (Kate Knibbs/Wired)
